title: Confession's of a Single Mom
description: Winter just has her hands full with her half a dozen kids that are like the egg carton logo. half a dozen instead of 12. She's a witty, funny single, divorced mother of half a dozen kids and learning to share her confessions of her life in real and connect with other parents like her out there in the "Real World" instead of just on paper. It took her a few years to realize that the hardest part of being a single mother really isn't the exhaustion or the sibling rivalry, or the lack of a social life and endless meal preperations of what was for dinner or struggles with finacial burdens, it's about how to cope being a single mom in the midst of real everyday chaos and still be calm. Â So yeah, it's hard for her being a single mom, But here are the flipsides of Winter being the single mom with alone time, Her and her kids are all a team.
author: Scarlett Frost
